hero.description: Full-stack development, automated testing, and DevOps — from someone who has led QA teams in corporate environments and worked on enterprise systems. That same experience is now available for your project.

about.description1: I'm Igor — a software engineer with over 20 years of experience in the IT industry. I currently lead a QA department at a leading global cybersecurity company, managing a team of 10+ QA engineers building products that protect organizations from digital threats.
about.description2: Throughout my career, I've progressed from software engineer to Director of QA. I've led teams of up to 15 IT engineers, coordinated international mobile banking projects, worked on core banking system implementations, and built QA processes from the ground up in corporate environments.
about.description3: I started DevLogic because I believe smaller companies and startups deserve the same level of technical quality and QA maturity I've been building in enterprise environments — but without corporate prices and bureaucracy. I work with modern technologies, use AI tools to accelerate development, and bring the same rigor to every project that I've applied to enterprise systems throughout my career.
